p: After appropriate supportive care and active treatment with antiviral therapy for less than 9 days, mainly including oral lopinavir and ritonavir tablets, aerosol inhalation of interferon-α2b at a dose of 5 × 10 6 U/day and oral administration of acetylcysteine tablets and Chinese medicine Lianhua Qingwen capsule. SARS-CoV-2 detection was successively negative twice for these patients, in addition to normal body temperature for 3 days as well as obvious improvement in respiratory symptoms and CT scan. Therefore, the patients were determined to be clinically cured at discharge [ 8]. One discharged patient was quarantined in a hotel, and the other three patients were quarantined in the hospital for 2 weeks.
